plot: An in-depth look and analysis at Shakespeare's significance and relevance to the modern world through interviews with Harold and his friends and family as they put on a production of "Hamlet" for their local high school.
title: Finding Hamlet
plot_es: An in-depth look and analysis at Shakespeare's significance and relevance to the modern world through interviews with Harold and his friends and family as they put on a production of "Hamlet" for their local high school.
plot_en: An in-depth look and analysis at Shakespeare's significance and relevance to the modern world through interviews with Harold and his friends and family as they put on a production of "Hamlet" for their local high school.
